about_the_game:
• Labyrinth with Traps and Enemies"
    Embark on a tense journey through mysterious and deadly labyrinths filled with unexpected traps and cunning enemies. You will need to solve puzzles, overcome obstacles, and avoid lethal mechanisms lurking at every turn. The enemy's intelligence won't let you relax — it will hunt you down, forcing you to make split-second decisions and find alternate routes. In this mode, everything depends on your reflexes, strategic thinking, and ability to quickly adapt to new threats.

    Building Mode
    For those who prefer to create rather than fight, this mode opens up a world of limitless possibilities. Manage four different regions, each offering its unique conditions and styles. Build structures, create complex constructions, and experiment with space. Your creations are limited only by your imagination. It's the perfect playground for those who want to bring their architectural dreams to life.

The enemy's intelligence won't let you relax — it will hunt you down, forcing you to make split-second decisions and find alternate routes. In this mode, everything depends on your reflexes, strategic thinking, and ability to quickly adapt to new threats.

    Building Mode
    For those who prefer to create rather than fight, this mode opens up a world of limitless possibilities. Manage four different regions, each offering its unique conditions and styles. Build structures, create complex constructions, and experiment with space. Your creations are limited only by your imagination. It's the perfect playground for those who want to bring their architectural dreams to life.
name: No Name Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7200 CPU @ 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 920MX
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • VR Support: Not supported

short_description: Labyrinth with traps and enemies: overcome deadly traps and avoid being chased by a treacherous enemy. Building mode: manage four regions, creating unique architectural masterpieces.
